Getting started¶

Use the following information to learn how to authenticate, send API requests, and complete basic operations by using the <officialProjectName API>.

  • Get your credentials
  • Install CLI clients
  • Send API requests to <officialProjectName>
  • Authenticate to the Rackspace Cloud
  • <officialProjectName> concepts
  • Create and manage load balancers

To start using the API and run the examples in this section, you need the following items:

  • Rackspace Cloud account. If you don’t have one, sign up for a :rax-cart:`Rackspace Cloud account <cloud>`.
  • Command-line tool or browser client for communicating with the API service.
